summary: Prolong your rise to glory with the new-and-improved Lover\'s Stone!
descriptionHtml:
================
[b]Description[/b]
================

   Have you ever crept through a dangerous crypt, only to discover that your sneaking had inadvertently made you more powerful than any of the monsters within? Has a relaxing day of mixing potions and forging armor suddenly made you the greatest warrior in the city?
   Well then, this mod may be for you! In an effort to prolong the joy of wearing my shoddy iron armor and bashing the heads of simple bandits and drauger, I\'ve remade the Lover Stone as a glorious monument to the feeble and world-weary Dovakiin who dot Skyrim\'s landscape.

   Upon installing this plugin, peasants and heros will be delighted to find that their Lover\'s blessing has become a curse, [b]drastically reducing the rate of skill growth![/b]

   Enjoy!

Oh, and future plans; I hope to eventually expand this tweak to penalize gold rewards... \'cause when you need more of a challenge, you might as well have every possible disadvantage!


================
[b]Official-Looking Notes Section![/b]
================

 - Added 3 additional versions, providing a 5%, 30%, and 50% growth rate. You only need to download one of them!

[b]V1.0[/b]

- The Lover stone will now reduce the rate of skill-increase by 90%.



================

If you enjoy being the opposite of a badass, you can also check out: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10397

-As always comments, compliments, endorsements will be met with squeals of joy!
author: Shar181
